name: demonstratively
content:
demonstratively adverb
(SHOWING FEELINGS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
showing your feelings or behaving in a way that shows your love: Some cultures show affection for children more demonstratively than others. He gestured demonstratively as he spoke. See
demonstrative
More examplesFewer examplesShe nodded demonstratively in agreement.He had demonstratively avoided them.They were demonstratively hostile toward us.
